content: a **free version** of this pattern is available on my blog here https //thislittlehookofmine blogspot com/2019/12/merlin html abracadabra and ala ka zam - this pattern looked and felt like magic to me it can also be imagined into so many other things - a daisy a starry night or even an 8-legged sea creature thus this pattern is named merlin after the famous magician and shapeshifter of *the legends of king arthur * this is the first in a series of squares i will be releasing that are inspired by *the legends of king arthur* additional patterns in this series can be found here https //www ravelry com/bundles/legends-of-king-arthur-series **special thanks to all the wonderful testers who helped with this project ** sarahefalconer absintheofmalice mawmawsgarden paradx madaboutpooh kaikelasa wuzzelpirate and wisdom61 you are truly wonderful
